Translations.Text: Wigi, ur sfunnugen di tmurt, ur asen illi bab, war Oebbi. Fellasen aaaqeb ar wayev. Ur zmiren ad slen, ur pwalin
D wigi i isxesoen iman nnsen. Itelf iten wayen d snulfuyen
Ur illi ccekk, ih, nitni ad xesoen, di laxeot, sennig wiyav
Ih, wid iumnen, u xeddmen ayen ilhan, u unzen aS i Mass nnsen, widak d at Loennet, degs ad wekkoen
Amedya n snat n trebbuyaa am uder$al, uaeeug, akked win ipwalin, win isellen. Day aadlen sin imedyaten agi? Day ur d tesmektayem ara
Ni$ Nuzen ed Nue i ugdud is: "nek d aneddao nnwen ipbegginen
iwakken ur taabdem siwa Oebbi. Nek ugaded aaaqeb fellawen, ass aqeohan
Nnan imvebboen, wid ijehlen, seg ugdud is: "kecc, $uone$, d amdan am nekwni. Nwala, d oodiyen nne$, kan, war ameyyez, i k ivefoen. Ur nwala s wacu i $ tifem. Xaii, neesb ikwen d ikeddaben
Inna: "a yagdud iw! Acu twalam ma ddi$ d ubeggen n Mass iw? Ifka yi d aeunu s$uoeS. Idreg fellawen. Day a t neeppem fellawen, ma kunwi tugim t
